title: Quiz 3: Safe Motherhood & Emergency Care
description: Evaluates understanding of safe motherhood pillars, emergency obstetric care signal functions, and abortion management.

questions.question: Which of the following are the Pillars of Safe Motherhood? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: The pillars are Family Planning, ANC, Obstetric/Newborn Care, PNC, Post-abortion Care, and STD/HIV Control.
questions.hint: Think of the continuum of care.

questions.question: Which function distinguishes Comprehensive EmONC (CEmONC) from Basic EmONC (BEmONC)?

richContent.content: Hint: BEmONC is usually at health center level, CEmONC is at hospital level.

questions.explanation: CEmONC includes all BEmONC functions PLUS Surgery (C-Section) and Blood Transfusion.

questions.question: Ergometrine should NEVER be given to a woman with ___BLANK___ because it can precipitate a seizure.
questions.explanation: Ergometrine causes vasoconstriction and can lead to stroke or eclamptic fits in hypertensive patients.
questions.hint: A condition involving high pressure in the arteries.

questions.question: Manual Vacuum Aspiration (MVA) is the preferred method for managing incomplete abortion for pregnancies up to:
questions.explanation: MVA is safer than D&C and is recommended for gestations of 14 weeks or less.

questions.question: Match the type of abortion with its description:

pairs.right: Bleeding with closed cervix, pregnancy may continue
Bleeding with open cervix, pregnancy cannot continue
Fetus dead but retained in uterus

questions.explanation: Threatened=Closed cervix; Inevitable=Open cervix; Incomplete=Partial expulsion; Missed=Dead fetus retained.
questions.hint: Focus on the status of the cervix and products of conception.

questions.question: Order the steps of basic newborn care immediately after birth:
questions.explanation: First ensure breathing/warmth, then separate form mother (cord), then bond (skin-to-skin), then routine care.

questions.question: Post-abortion care includes providing family planning methods before the woman leaves the facility.
questions.explanation: True. Post-abortion family planning is a critical element to prevent future unwanted pregnancies and unsafe abortions.

questions.question: What is the term for the first secretion from the breast, rich in nutrients and immunity, which is sometimes wrongly discarded in traditional practices?
questions.explanation: Colostrum is the 'first milk' and is essential for the newborn's immunity.

questions.question: Which of the following items might be included in a Birth Plan? (Select all that apply)
questions.explanation: A birth plan includes preferences for care, companions, and pain relief. You cannot plan the exact date of natural delivery.

questions.question: What is the correct action if a woman presents with Puerperal Sepsis?

options.text: Give antibiotics and refer if necessary

questions.explanation: Puerperal sepsis is a life-threatening infection requiring immediate antibiotic treatment.
